message: Hello geeks, i want build something like www.wix.com , or www.simplesite.com , where user can choose a template, theme, edit everything on the fly and has his own website ready in minutes, what do you suggest ? is there anything that you could as i dont wont to re-invent the wheel and do it all from scratch ?
story: Akram Mohamed shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: Free Website Builder | Create a Free Website | WIX.com
caption: wix.com
description: Create a free website with Wix.com. Customize with Wix' website builder, no coding skills needed. Choose a design, begin customizing and be online today

data.message:
It's like asking for directions on how to build an airbnb for pets.

We tend to be very technical here. An acceptable answer to your question would to either give you a detailed technical roadmap to building a clone of wix or similar products

Or suggesting a turnkey solution to use which you could have easily found googling if such one existed. 

Thing is, none of the two answers are acceptable here in this group. So do rephrase your question and ask about a specific technical detail/challenge.
